distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for hawk2 fixes the following security issue:

- CVE-2020-35458: Fixed an insufficient input handler that could have led to remote code execution (bsc#1179998).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: An issue was discovered in ClusterLabs Hawk 2.x through 2.3.0-x. There is a Ruby shell code injection issue via the hawk_remember_me_id parameter in the login_from_cookie cookie. The user logout routine could be used by unauthenticated remote attackers to execute code as hauser.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
